Job Title: Appraiser
Company: Richardson Ltd

About Us:
Richardson Ltd is a leading appraisal firm dedicated to providing expert valuation services to our clients. We pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and our team-oriented approach.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Appraiser to join our team. As an Appraiser, you will be responsible for conducting on-site inspections, analyzing market data, and preparing detailed appraisal reports. You will work closely with our clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.

Responsibilities:

 Conduct on-site inspections of properties to gather data and take photos
 Analyze market data and sales trends to determine property values
 Prepare detailed appraisal reports, including written descriptions and valuation estimates
 Communicate effectively with clients to understand their needs and provide exceptional customer service
 Stay up-to-date with industry trends and regulatory changes

Qualifications and Experience:

 Bachelor's degree in Real Estate, Finance, or a related field
 2+ years of experience in appraisal or a related field
 Strong analytical and communication skills
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team

What We Offer:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $60,000 to $80,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision coverage, as well as a 401(k) matching program.

Our Company Culture:
We appreciate employees who maintain conventional ethics and are committed to upholding traditional values.
